name: forms hotel
description:
forms hotel

Rid the haunted hotel of the shambling black forms!!!

Clear all the rooms, then find the stairs to the next floor. Spray neutralizing gas at entities to destroy them.

Six floors of form-shambling action, with cute pixel art.

Game by valentines.

controls
  • Arrow keys or WASD to move,
  • Mouse and left mouse button to aim and spray at enemies.
